404 
405  template <typename T>
406  void AddAccelerator(const String& accelerator, T func,
407  Gwen::Event::Handler* handler = NULL)
408  {
409  if (handler == NULL)
410  handler = this;
411 
412  Gwen::Event::Caller* caller = new Gwen::Event::Caller();
413  caller->Add(handler, func);
414  Gwen::String str = accelerator;
415  Gwen::Utility::Strings::ToUpper(str);
416  Gwen::Utility::Strings::Strip(str, " ");
417  m_Accelerators[ str ] = caller;
418  }
419 
420  void AddAccelerator(const String& accelerator)
421  {
422  AddAccelerator(accelerator, &Base::DefaultAccel, this);
423  }
424 
425  AccelMap m_Accelerators;

653  template <class T>
654  inline T* gwen_cast(Gwen::Controls::Base* p)
655  {
656  if (!p)
657  return NULL;
658 
659  Gwen::Controls::Base* pReturn = p->DynamicCast(T::GetIdentifier());
660 
661  if (!pReturn)
662  return NULL;
663 
664  return static_cast<T*>(pReturn);
665  }
666 
667  template <class T>
668  inline T* Controls::Base::FindChild(const Gwen::String& name, bool bRecursive)
669  {
670  return gwen_cast<T>(FindChildByName(name, bRecursive));
671  }
672 
673 #define GWEN_DYNAMIC(THISNAME, BASENAME) \
674  static const char* GetIdentifier() \
675  { \
676  static const char* ident = #BASENAME ":" #THISNAME; \
677  return ident; \
678  } \
679  virtual Gwen::Controls::Base* DynamicCast(const char* Variable) \
680  { \
681  if (GetIdentifier() == Variable) \
682  return this; \
683  \
684  return BaseClass::DynamicCast(Variable); \
685  }
686 
687 #define GWEN_CLASS(THISNAME, BASENAME) \
688  typedef BASENAME BaseClass; \
689  typedef THISNAME ThisClass;
690 
691 // To be placed in the controls .h definition.
692 #define GWEN_CONTROL(THISNAME, BASENAME) \
693 public: \
694  GWEN_CLASS(THISNAME, BASENAME) \
695  GWEN_DYNAMIC(THISNAME, BASENAME) \
696  virtual const char* GetTypeName() { return #THISNAME; } \
697  virtual const char* GetBaseTypeName() { return BaseClass::GetTypeName(); } \
698  THISNAME(Gwen::Controls::Base*pParent, const Gwen::String&pName = "")
699 
700 #define GWEN_CONTROL_INLINE(THISNAME, BASENAME) \
701  GWEN_CONTROL(THISNAME, BASENAME) : BaseClass(pParent, pName)
702 
703 #define GWEN_CONTROL_CONSTRUCTOR(THISNAME) \
704  THISNAME::THISNAME(Gwen::Controls::Base* pParent, const Gwen::String& pName) \
705  : BaseClass(pParent, pName)
706 
707 } // namespace Gwen
708
